plot: Tom Baldwin shoots T.J. in the head during interrogation....or did he?

It seems that earlier that morning Tom entered an NTAC interrogation room and shot TJ Kim. In the end, Boyd Gelder is apprehended and Tom is able to clear his name. Meanwhile, Richard undertakes a journey to release Lily's ashes, and Diana discovers that Kevin Burkhoff, who has been injecting himself with doses of promicin, has developed a 4400 ability. Burkhoff can, sometimes, heal his body. In the closing scene we see Isabelle and Shawn kissing.—Amjad. (Helsinki, Finland)
